GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.13 to before v4.14.292
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around netdev_budget.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit c9328c3d5a9eb21da020c7a9490964554963d2eb, it was introduced in version v2.6.13 by commit 51b0bdedb8e784d0d969a6b77151911130812400. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around netdev_budget.
